amendment.description: Amendment allows State and local education agencies access to Federal crime information databases in order that fingerprint-based checks on prospective employees may be conducted.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record. to allow school districts, through the state executive officer, to access finger-print based criminal history records for prospective employees who will come into close contact with students. Additionally, whenever possible, the amendment allows for access to any applicable state criminal records.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
